pr_title: HadoopCatalog.dropNamespace throw NamespaceNotEmptyException when Namespace is not empty

timeline.message: HadoopCatalog.dropNamespace should throw NamespaceNotEmptyException when Namespace is not empty

timeline.bodyText: listStatus returns an array which means it lists all the files before returning. Should we use listFiles which returns an Iterator. Iterator could be a lot more efficient as we do not need to list all the underlying files in the dir and we can simply do listFiles.hasNext
timeline.author: rdsr

replies.bodyText: Good point! Sounds good to me. We can use listStatusIterator.
replies.author: JingsongLi
